fields.name: AccessKey
fields.description: Storage account access key. Required only if `accessType` is set to `AccessKey`.

fields.name: AccessType
fields.description: The type of access to be used for the storage account.

fields.name: BackupName
fields.description: The name of the backup file to create/retrieve.

fields.name: ClientId
fields.description: The Client ID of user assigned managed identity. Required only if `accessType` is set to `UserAssignedManagedIdentity`.

fields.name: ContainerName
fields.description: The name of the blob container (used to place/retrieve the backup).

fields.name: StorageAccount
fields.description: The name of the Azure storage account (used to place/retrieve the backup).
